thread.title: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes
thread.title_full: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes

author: TV Guide
title: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes
text: Ouch! NBC Cuts The Player Down to Just Nine Episodes The game has been cut short: NBC has trimmed The Player's original episode order from 13 to 9 for its first season, ... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 8:08 PM Updated at 10:40 PM Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 8:08 PM Updated at 10:40 PM The game has been cut short: NBC has trimmed The Player 's original episode order from 13 to 9 for its first season, Deadline reports. The news comes after the drama saw its first ratings growth last week, rising to a 0.8 among adults 18-49 and 4.14 total viewers. The Player stars Philip Winchester as Alex Kane, a private security specialist in Las Vegas who finds himself drawn into a high-stakes conspiracy involving the world's richest people gambling on crime. Wesley Snipes stars as "the pit boss" and Charity Wakefield as "the dealer." The Player airs Thursdays at 10/9c on NBC. Are you upset by the news? Other Links From TVGuide.com
